  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3463</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3463</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">La Traviata</string>
            <string language="en">"La Traviata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">"La Traviata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">"La La Traviata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">"La Traviata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">"La Traviata"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">"Λα Traviata"</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs didàctic interactiu amb l'audició del Brindis de la traviata, l'anàlisi de la seqüència d'entrada de les veus i el reconeixement de l'entrada dels timbres vocals.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive teaching resource consisting of listening to the drinking song from "La Traviata", analysing the sequence in which the different voices start singing, and recognizing the different timbres.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">escoltar música</string>
            <string language="en">listening to music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">cant</string>
            <string language="en">singing</string>
            <string language="es">canto</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives unterrichtendes Hilfsmittel, das aus
dem Hören zum Sauflied "vom La Traviata", dem Analysieren der 
Reihenfolge besteht, in der die unterschiedlichen Stimmen anfangen, zu
singen und dem Erkennen der unterschiedlichen timbres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écouter se composant d'enseignement interactif 
de ressource la chanson de boissons de la "La la Traviata", analyse de
l'ordre dans lequel les différentes voix commencent à chanter, et 
identification des différents timbres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Escutar consistindo ensinando interativo do 
recurso a canção bebendo do "la Traviata", analisando a seqüência 
em que as vozes diferentes começam cantar, e reconhecendo os timbres 
diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ascoltare consistente d'istruzione interattivo 
delle risorse la canzone bevente "da La Traviata", analizzare la 
sequenza in cui le voci differenti cominciano cantare e riconoscere i 
timbres differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς διδασκαλίας που 
αποτελείται από το άκουσμα στο τραγούδι κατανάλωσης από "το Λα 
Traviata", που αναλύει την ακολουθία στην οποία οι διαφορετικές
φωνές αρχίζουν, και τις διαφορετικές χροιές.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hören Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Singen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">écouter la musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">escutar a música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cantar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ascoltando la musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άκουσμα τη μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδι</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
